line.comment: *stops during phase 3 and triggers Katana fleet instead
* randomly decide how many sectors to turn. Always stay below the customizable limit and get more if the Rebel faction is small.
* We don't want to take sectors from already weak factions.
* send a log message for each turned sector
* Break if we have enough sectors.
